top_comments.comment: Allie Sherlock continues to break new ground  with almost every new video. Here she is really starting to show what she is capable of . Would be great to hear her at Glastonbury or the Isle of Wight  fest .. She is a unique and powerful performance artist-  would like to hear more of her own songs. These solo performances are the way to go for her I'm sure.
One of my favorite songs by Adele n this young talented lady Gave Me Goosebumps...love it keep it up
Your going to hit 5 Million subscribers before the end of the year...👍

comments_since_last_sample.body: Aahhhhhh that was so bloody fantastic👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏❤️… your voice is an absolute delight to my day😍
You smashed that one out the park 👏 loving the guitar
